---
title: "Uniform-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("runif-0-4.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Unif04Call <- stream_in(file("runif-0-4-Call-Revised.jsonl"))
```

4. The Results

```{r}
Unif04Result <- stream_in(file("runif-0-4_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Unif.0.4.OpenAI <- left_join(Unif04Call,Unif04Result)
Full.Unif.0.4 <- left_join(Unif04$params, Unif.0.4.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Unif.0.4.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Unif.0.4$Outcome <- map_chr(Unif04$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Unif04Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Unif.0.4$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Unif.0.4, file="Full.Unif.0.4.RData")
```
